title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for May 2025
description: The bonus round solutions for May 2025. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for May 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today throughout May 2025. We'll also include the Fan Friday word when available.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Below you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout the month of May 2025. The solution to the final puzzle will be displayed first followed by the other answers for the toss-ups and regular puzzles. Continuing from last month, the theme for this week’s puzzles is Lake Life, so many of the answers and categories will relate to this. As a reminder, these solutions are for the weekday show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White. If you’re looking for this year’s Celebrity Wheel of Fortune hosted by Pat Sajak, you can find the solutions for the latest episode here. Tonight’s episode feature three contestants: Natalya Batenman, Andrew Leachko, and Audrey Cheatham. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for May 9. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Friday, May 9, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – OUR YEARLY BASH [Event] Tossup #1 – NAPPING UNDER AN UMBRELLA [Life’s A Beach] Tossup #2 – COFFEE TOFFEE [Rhyme Time] Regular Puzzle #1 – PARTY & STUFFED ANIMAL [Same Name] Regular Puzzle #2 – PORTOBELLO MUSHROOM BURGER [Food & Drink] Regular Puzzle #3 – LOOKING OUT AT THE MOUNTAINS [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #3 – WILD VIOLETS [Colorful Language] Tossup #4 – VIOLET BLOUSE [Colorful Language] Tossup #5 – ULTRAVIOLET LIGHT [Colorful Language] Regular Puzzle #4 – WATER, WATER EVERYWHERE [Quotation] Fan Friday – LEGENDARY Here are the puzzle answers for Thursday, May 8: Bonus Round Puzzle – ACCOMPLISHED AVIATOR [Person] Tossup #1 – I’VE NEVER FELT BETTER [Phrase] Tossup #2 – THROWING A FRISBEE [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #1 – YOU LIGHT UP MY LIFE RAFT [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #2 – LISTENING TO THE SOUND OF THE OCEAN [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #3 – PACK LOTS OF SNACKS [Travel Tip] Tossup #3 – LATE BLOOMER [Wordplay] Tossup #4 – BLOOMING ONION [Wordplay] Tossup #5 – COMFY BLOOMERS [Wordplay] Regular Puzzle #4 – COOL CUSTOMER [Person] Here are the puzzle answers for Wednesday, May 7: Bonus Round Puzzle – BUZZING AROUND [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – PERFECT WAVES [Things] Tossup #2 – BAMBOO STEAMER [In The Kitchen] Regular Puzzle #1 – TANGY TASTY TANTALIZING [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – PUBLIC DISPLAYS OF AFFECTION THAT ORANGE JUICE [Food for Thought] Regular Puzzle #4 – WORKING ON MY SCREENPLAY [Showbiz] Here are the puzzles answers for Tuesday, May 6: Bonus Round Puzzle – ON THE JUKEBOX [Phrase] Tossup #1 – OCTOPUS AND SQUID [Living Things] Tossup #2 – MUSICAL CHAIRS [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #1 – PARTLY BREEZY MOSTLY BEAUTIFUL [Weather Report] Regular Puzzle #2 – GOING ON A WINNING STREAK [Event] Regular – MY BEST GUESS [Thing] Here are the puzzles answers for Monday, May 5: Bonus Round Puzzle – IN A FIX [Phrase] Tossup #1 – SEAFOOD TACOS [Food & Drink] Tossup #2 – PANAMA HAT [What Are You Wearing?] Regular Puzzle #1 – TAKING THE DUNE BUGGY FOR A SPIN [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #2 – DANCE CLUB SANDWICH [Before & After] Tossup #3 – CLEAR BLUE SKY [Colorful Language] Tossup #4 – CRYSTAL BLUE WATER [Colorful Language] Tossup #5 – TANGLED UP IN BLUE [Colorful Language] Regular Puzzle #3 – SHAKESPEAREAN ACTORS [People] Regular Puzzle #4 – THE CREAM OF THE CROP [Food For Thought] Here are the puzzles answers for Friday, May 2: Bonus Round Puzzle – RUMMAGING IN THE BACKYARD [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – RIDING A JET SKI [Fun & Games] Tossup #2 – LOBSTER BISQUE [Food & Drink] Regular Puzzle #1 – CUTTING THROUGH RED TAPE [Colorful Language] Regular Puzzle #2 – I WANT TO HOLD YOUR HAND-ME-DOWNS [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #3 – EXPLORING THE JUNGLE [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #3 – JELLY BEAN [Wordplay] Tossup #4 – BEANBAG CHAIR [Wordplay] Tossup #5 – WEARING A BEANIE [Wordplay] Regular Puzzle #4 – CLEVER ENDEAVOR [Rhyme Time] Fan Friday – TRUFFLE Here are the puzzles answers for Thursday, May 1: Bonus Round Puzzle – ACTING QUIRKY [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – PICNIC BASKET [Thing] Tossup #2 – CHERRY COBBLER [Just Desserts] Regular Puzzle #1 – FISH FROGS FIREFLIES & FIDDLESTICKS [Same Letter] Regular Puzzle #2 – EIGHTIES THEMED PARTY [Fun & Games] Regular Puzzle #3 – WHATEVER FLOATS YOUR BOAT [Phrase] Tossup #3 – STRETCHING MY ARMS [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #4 – STRETCHING MY BACK [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #5 – STRETCHING THE TRUTH [What Are You Doing?] Regular Puzzle #4 – SOAK UP THE SUN [Song Title] This month, you can enter the Escape The Beach giveaway where you can explore Vanna’s hometown. From May 5 to 9, viewers have a chance to win a six-night oceanfront getaway in Myrtle Beach. And of course the Fan Fridays sweepstakes by Collette is still active too. In July, Wheel of Fortune will be live in Las Vegas on July 11, 12, 18, and 19 with tickets available at Paris Las Vegas Hotel & Casino.
html:
Below you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer today throughout the month of May 2025. The solution to the final puzzle will be displayed first followed by the other answers for the toss-ups and regular puzzles.

Continuing from last month, the theme for this week’s puzzles is Lake Life, so many of the answers and categories will relate to this. As a reminder, these solutions are for the weekday show hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White. If you’re looking for this year’s Celebrity Wheel of Fortune hosted by Pat Sajak, you can find the solutions for the latest episode here. Tonight’s episode feature three contestants: Natalya Batenman, Andrew Leachko, and Audrey Cheatham. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for May 9.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Friday, May 9, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – OUR YEARLY BASH [Event]
  • Tossup #1 – NAPPING UNDER AN UMBRELLA [Life’s A Beach]
  • Tossup #2 – COFFEE TOFFEE [Rhyme Time]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – PARTY & STUFFED ANIMAL [Same Name]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – PORTOBELLO MUSHROOM BURGER [Food & Drink]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – LOOKING OUT AT THE MOUNTAINS [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #3 – WILD VIOLETS [Colorful Language]
  • Tossup #4 – VIOLET BLOUSE [Colorful Language]
  • Tossup #5 – ULTRAVIOLET LIGHT [Colorful Language]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – WATER, WATER EVERYWHERE [Quotation]
  • Fan Friday – LEGENDARY

Here are the puzzle answers for Thursday, May 8:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – ACCOMPLISHED AVIATOR [Person]
  • Tossup #1 – I’VE NEVER FELT BETTER [Phrase]
  • Tossup #2 – THROWING A FRISBEE [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – YOU LIGHT UP MY LIFE RAFT [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – LISTENING TO THE SOUND OF THE OCEAN [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – PACK LOTS OF SNACKS [Travel Tip]
  • Tossup #3 – LATE BLOOMER [Wordplay]
  • Tossup #4 – BLOOMING ONION [Wordplay]
  • Tossup #5 – COMFY BLOOMERS [Wordplay]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – COOL CUSTOMER [Person]

Here are the puzzle answers for Wednesday, May 7:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – BUZZING AROUND [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #1 – PERFECT WAVES [Things]
  • Tossup #2 – BAMBOO STEAMER [In The Kitchen]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – TANGY TASTY TANTALIZING [Same Letter]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – PUBLIC DISPLAYS OF AFFECTION THAT AREN’T MINE [Pet Peeve]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – A HEARTY STOUT [Happy Hour]
  • Tossup #3 – COCONUT CREEK FLORIDA [Food for Thought]
  • Tossup #4 – COCOA BEACH FLORIDA [Food for Thought]

Here are the puzzles answers for Tuesday, May 6:

  • Tossup #4 – WINDSURFING [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #5 – CHANNEL SURFING [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – MY BEST GUESS [Thing]

Here are the puzzles answers for Monday, May 5:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – IN A FIX [Phrase]
  • Tossup #1 – SEAFOOD TACOS [Food & Drink]
  • Tossup #2 – PANAMA HAT [What Are You Wearing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – TAKING THE DUNE BUGGY FOR A SPIN [Fun & Games]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – DANCE CLUB SANDWICH [Before & After]
  • Tossup #3 – CLEAR BLUE SKY [Colorful Language]
  • Tossup #4 – CRYSTAL BLUE WATER [Colorful Language]
  • Tossup #5 – TANGLED UP IN BLUE [Colorful Language]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – SHAKESPEAREAN ACTORS [People]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – THE CREAM OF THE CROP [Food For Thought]

Here are the puzzles answers for Friday, May 2:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – RUMMAGING IN THE BACKYARD [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #1 – RIDING A JET SKI [Fun & Games]
  • Tossup #2 – LOBSTER BISQUE [Food & Drink]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – CUTTING THROUGH RED TAPE [Colorful Language]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – I WANT TO HOLD YOUR HAND-ME-DOWNS [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – EXPLORING THE JUNGLE [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #3 – JELLY BEAN [Wordplay]
  • Tossup #4 – BEANBAG CHAIR [Wordplay]

Here are the puzzles answers for Thursday, May 1:

  • Tossup #4 – STRETCHING MY BACK [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #5 – STRETCHING THE TRUTH [What Are You Doing?]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – SOAK UP THE SUN [Song Title]

This month, you can enter the Escape The Beach giveaway where you can explore Vanna’s hometown. From May 5 to 9, viewers have a chance to win a six-night oceanfront getaway in Myrtle Beach. And of course the Fan Fridays sweepstakes by Collette is still active too.

In July, Wheel of Fortune will be live in Las Vegas on July 11, 12, 18, and 19 with tickets available at Paris Las Vegas Hotel & Casino.
